name: DeWALT® - Cordless 8 V Li-ion Rear-Handle
description: Cordless 8 V Li-ion Rear-Handle Compact Screwdriver Kit with 2 Batteries by DeWALT®. The 8V MAX Gyroscopic Screwdriver 2 Battery Kit is ideal for achieving precision, speed, and control. Adjustable two-position handle allows for operation in either in-line or pistol-grip to suit the professional's needs.

name: Performance Tool® - Cordless 19.2 V Ni-Cd 1.2 Ah Mid-Handle Drill/Driver Kit
description: Cordless 19.2 V Ni-Cd 1.2 Ah Mid-Handle Drill/Driver Kit by Performance Tool®. This top-grade product is expertly made in compliance with stringent industry standards to offer a fusion of a well-balanced design and high level of craftsmanship.

name: Black & Decker® - AutoSense™ Cordless 20 V Li-ion 1.5 Ah Mid-Handle Drill
description: AutoSense™ Cordless 20 V Li-ion 1.5 Ah Mid-Handle Drill/Driver Kit with AutoSense™ Technology by Black & Decker®. Whether you enjoy doing DIY projects or need to complete some repair work in your home, you need to have right tools in your garage or workshop.

name: DeWALT® - ATOMIC Compact™ Cordless 20 V Brushless Mid-Handle Drill/Driver
description: ATOMIC Compact™ Cordless 20 V Brushless Mid-Handle Drill/Driver by DeWALT®. The Brushless Compact Drill/Driver Kit includes two 20V MAX Lithium Ion batteries, charger, and carrying bag. It is only 6.3 in. front to back, and its high-performance brushless motor delivers 340 unit watts outs (UWO).

name: Milwaukee® - M12 Fuel™ Cordless 12 V D-Handle Drill/Driver
description: M12 Fuel™ Cordless 12 V D-Handle Drill/Driver by Milwaukee®. The M12 FUEL™ Installation Drill/Driver Kit features 4 dedicated solutions, delivering unrivaled access and control with up to 300 in-lbs of max torque. Four dedicated heads, including a 3/8 Chuck, Offset Driver, 1/4 Hex, and Right Angle, can attach in 16 different positions.

name: Pulsar® - Cordless 20 V Li-ion 2.0 Ah Mid-Handle Screwdriver Kit
description: Cordless 20 V Li-ion 2.0 Ah Mid-Handle Screwdriver Kit by Pulsar®. Pulsar’s PT28120 Cordless Impact Driver is equipped with a ¼” quick-release collet and has an impact rate up to 3000 IPM at 0-2200 RPM with forward, reverse, and an electric brake.
